snippet: A new document meant to solidify the Vatican’s increasingly positive relations with Jews says members should work to fight anti-Semitism.
abstract: Vatican stresses intimate relationship between Christianity and Judaism in statement, latest move in recent efforts to make peace between two faiths after centuries of acrimony; Jewish leaders laud document which asks Catholics not to try to convert Jews, and urges their participation in fight against anti-Semitism.
lead_paragraph: A new document meant to solidify the Vatican’s increasingly positive relations with Jews says members should work to fight anti-Semitism.

headline.main: Vatican Says Catholics Should Not Try to Convert Jews
